> I am not really up to speed on actual ratios for character levels
but I like the idea. I can definitely see it in Openglad-e.

I'd suggest a different type of scenario to handle that info.  For
example, the scenario would have characters experience levels set as
"+2" meaning 2 experience levels higher than the norm or "-2" meaning
2 experience levels below norm just to give a variation.

I saw where you guys wanted to produce a scenario that showed off the
features of Open Gladiator: Enhanced.  Frankly, I think it should be a
set of scenarios to show off the new features, each one showing off
one particular new feature.

I never quite found the code where it spells out how strong each
attack is.  I'm sure it's some really complicated formula.
